name: VITE_API_BASE_URL
description: Base URL for the public API gateway consumed by the browser client.
notes: Value is observable from network traffic and carries no credential material.

name: VITE_STRIPE_PUBLISHABLE_KEY
description: Stripe publishable key required by Stripe.js for client-side checkout initialization.
notes: Publishable keys are intentionally public per Stripe guidance; secret keys remain server-side.
